captions.text:
If I tell you to be with me
You should always be with me
Why have I come to see you..
You're the only reason I'm here
I'm saying this cause I'm sorry
I'm saying this cause you're crying

I couldn't even breathe
I just say it
My silly heart hastens to say it
Trying to endure and stop it
Trying to stop me saying it

But my heart still says
The words 'I love you'
Now you walk just like me

Little by little
You disappear from my view

I repeat it
Don't walk away from me
Now you walk just like me

Little by little
You disappear from my view
It will be the last time
I'm the one who should be hurt
It will be the last time

Little by little
You disappear from my view
I'm the one who should be hurt

title: Ye sung(예성)_Gray paper(먹지)(Baramibunda(그 겨울, 바람이 분다) OST Part 1) MV

comments.text:
Finally took some time to watch this drama since everybody keeps talking 
how great it is. And how was I surprised, it really is great! I do not 
prefer  korean nor japanese dramas, but this one is completely different. 
Interesting plot, good actors 
(I totally buyed the main actor being blind), it got darkness, humor, love 
and very low level of 'bubble effect' which I appreaciate. Oh, and osts are 
great, each song is just to special, awesome :)﻿
